meanings.definition: A cloud chart or diagram showing the types and characteristics of clouds.
meanings.sent1: The nephograms in the book helped me understand different cloud types.
meanings.sent2: The meteorologist used a nephogram to explain the cloud formations.
meanings.sent3: Looking at the nephogram, I couldn't help but imagine the clouds as fluffy animals.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a nephogram of thoughts, swirling and changing like clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The nephogram made the cloud patterns look like a painting in the sky.

meanings.definition: A photograph or image of clouds.
meanings.sent1: I took a nephogram of the beautiful sunset clouds.
meanings.sent2: The nephogram captured the dramatic sky before the storm.
meanings.sent3: The nephogram on his phone showed the clouds looking like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the nephogram was as bright as the sun peeking through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The nephogram displayed a breathtaking view of the clouds over the mountains.
